text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump @DonaldJTrumpJr - @realDonaldTrump Allows Coronavirus-infected 14 coronavirus-stricken Americans evacuated from a cruise ship in Japan were flown back to US on plane full of healthy people against advice from the CDC, #TrumpIsAnIdiot @StateDept approved this dangerous flight. https://t.co/sMNWMDi8jC

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Passengers disembark coronavirus-affected Diamond Princess cruise ship in Japan
entity.description: Passengers who tested negative for coronavirus on the Diamond Princess cruise ship have started to disembark in Yokohama, Japan. The ship, which carried around 3,700 people, has been quarantined in Yokohama since February 3.
